data.Sentence_cn: 他不是那个技师吗？
data.Sentence: Isn't he the mechanic?

data.Sentence_cn: 是他修理你的汽车吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't he repair your car?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，他就是修理我汽车的技师。
data.Sentence: Yes, he's the mechanic who repaired my car.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们不是那些贼吗？
data.Sentence: Aren't they the thieves?

data.Sentence_cn: 警察不是要抓他们吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't the police catch them?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，他们是警察要抓的贼。
data.Sentence: Yes, they're the thieves whom the police caught.

data.Sentence_cn: 它不是那辆车吗？
data.Sentence: Isn't that the car?

data.Sentence_cn: 你去年没有卖掉它吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't you sell it last year?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，那是我去年卖掉的那辆车。
data.Sentence: Yes, that's the car which I sold last year.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们不是那些孩子吗？
data.Sentence: Aren't they the children?

data.Sentence_cn: 他们不是住在隔壁吗？
data.Sentence: Don't they live next door?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，他们是住在隔壁的那些孩子。
data.Sentence: Yes, they're the children Who live next door.

data.Sentence_cn: 那不是搬运工吗？
data.Sentence: Isn't that the porter?

data.Sentence_cn: 他不是帮你提箱了吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't he carry your suitcase?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，他是帮我提箱子的门卫
data.Sentence: Yes, he's the porter who carried my suitcase.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们不是那些窗户吗？
data.Sentence: Aren't they the windows?

data.Sentence_cn: 孩子们昨天不是打碎了它们吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't the children break them yesterday?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，它们是那些孩子们昨天打碎的窗户。
data.Sentence: Yes, they're the Windows which the Children broke yesterday.

data.Sentence_cn: 那不是那个硬币吗？
data.Sentence: Isn't that the coin?

data.Sentence_cn: 不是你在花园找到的吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't you find it in the garden?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，那是我在花园找到的硬币。
data.Sentence: Yes, that's the coin which I found in the garden.

data.Sentence_cn: 她不是那个女人吗？
data.Sentence: Isn't she the woman?

data.Sentence_cn: 不是你开车送她去伦敦的吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't you drive her to London?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，她是那个我开车送到伦敦的女人。
data.Sentence: Yes, she's the woman whom I drove to London.

data.Sentence_cn: 那不是那些书吗？
data.Sentence: Aren't these the books?

data.Sentence_cn: 不是你上周买的那些吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't you buy them last week?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，他们是我上周买的那些书。
data.Sentence: Yes, they're the books which I bought last week

data.Sentence_cn: 他们不是那些人吗？
data.Sentence: Aren't they the people?

data.Sentence_cn: 你不是邀请他们去聚会的吗？
data.Sentence: Didn't you invite them to your party?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的，他们是我邀请去聚会的人。
data.Sentence: Yes, they're the people whom I invited to my party.
